resources.string: Name as it appears in Messenger
Zip Code (where you will be exchanging)

string.name: loginlink
string.u: If your details do not appear, click here to Login

resources.string: The Supplies Me initiative distributes used/usable supplies to children in under resourced schools.
1. Find a match based on zip code and preferred distance.
2. Using Messenger or Messenger Lite, arrange to exchange supplies.
Give usable supplies from your home...
To receive, reach out to any number of participants.

items include: pencils, erasers, sharpeners, pens, crayons, highlighters, markers, notebooks, paper, folders, binders, glue, scissors, backpacks, rulers, pencil cases, small toys, anything school related!
Signing up is no guarantee of finding a match.
Encourage participation in your community, so you are more likely to find a match nearby!
Find someone in need of supplies
Find someone who has supplies to give
Make a selection to find a match:
